entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-29145 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #222
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-23267 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #221
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-29117 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #220
  • .NET May 2022 Updates #219

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationExtensions.GetRequiredValue #69163
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Analyzer/fixer for converting Stream.Read calls to ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69159
  • Fix IDE0075: Conditional expression can be simplified #69156
  • [monoapi] Change MonoAssemblyPreLoadFuncV3 to enable faster hooks #69155
    7.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackFrameTests.Ctor_FNeedFileInfo #69154
  • AssemblyName.GetPublicKeyToken() may return byte[160] instead of byte[8] #69153
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-23267 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #69149
  • Interop source generator should respect sign of the requested type for bool marshalling #69147
  • Can't install dotnet-runtime-6.0 (6.0.5) on debian bullseye #69146
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Possible race condition seen in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint` #69144
  • [wasm] Fix new compiler warnings in the native code #69142
    7.0.0
  • Libraries linker tests aren't running in CI #69139
    7.0.0
  • Should we check-in a default set of tasks to make it easier to work within vscode? #69135
  • aspnet core Identity not working after deployment on server #69134
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate list?.Count #69133
    7.0.0
  • SSH from .NET Core support #69130
  • segfault when calling MarshalNative::GCHandleInternalGet in System.Net.Requests.Tests in rolling CI #69125
    7.0.0
  • Allow JsonExtensionData on Records #69123
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #69140
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_UInt64 #69143
  • Reconsider normal/no_tiered_compilation jobs #69122
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] MaxInteger[T](System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[T])' violates the constraint of type parameter 'T' exception error #69119
  • Rename mentions of Redhawk to NativeAOT. #69115
  • Installer Build and Test failures in rolling CI #69114
  • GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd failed in rolling with "Large Memory Machine required" #69113
  • AnalyzerReference vs ProjectReference #69111
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.EnvironmentTests.OSVersion_ValidVersion failing in CI #69110
  • `System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout` failing on `Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x86 Release` #69101
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add async overload of ChangeToken.OnChange #69099
    Future
  • Marshalling a collection of elements that require two-stage marshalling does not preserve the marshaller state? #69096
  • Improve gRPC support on mobile platforms #69095
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/Matrix4x4_r/Matrix4x4_r.sh #69093
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/Arrays/lcs/lcs2_r/lcs2_r.cmd #69092
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\tailcalls_do\\tailcalls_do.cmd #69090
  • Return value marshalling should not require CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69086
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Creating symbolic links without developer mode or elevation fails silently #62975
    7.0.0
  • Thousands of analyzer warnings are thrown inside Visual Studio #68764
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Base64 #68821
    7.0.0
  • Can't build on MacOS clr+libs #69161
  • NetworkInformation tests show weird error on macOS #64441
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][nodejs] `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.SendAsync_ContentLengthAndTransferEncodingHeaders_IgnoreContentLength` #69085
  • Problems with ASP.NET projects when consuming .NET Standard assets #25770
    Future
  • Enable TLS tickets / resumption with OpenSSL on Linux #22977
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add LifetimeAnnotationAttribute #68622
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Tests fails on iOS/tvOS #36892
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Not implemented: System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo.SetExceptions(Byte* exceptions, Int32 exceptionsSize) #31858
    7.0.0
  • Build crossgen with NativeAOT and trimming #64571
    7.0.0
  • Segfault inside JIT in libraries-jitstress #68756
  • PAL uses wrong type for chflags flags #69005
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #68443
    7.0.0
  • Linux arm64 Release NativeAOT failures in System.Reflection.Tests #69136
  • [Eng] RunOnly Wasm Runtime Tests Will Fail Non-Deterministically; Add locking #41193
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Test failed: System.Tests.GCTests.LatencyRoundtrips* #31657
    7.0.0
  • Benchmark Dotnet AOT build failing with exit 1 #67098
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Implement SetGCLatencyMode and SetLOHCompactionMode #46666
    7.0.0
  • Source Generator projects don't need to be included in other library's sln files #58879
    7.0.0
  • [WASM runtime test infrastucture] Environment variable is not set: 'CORE_ROOT' #41520
    7.0.0
  • overview of long running library tests #35101
    Future
  • If RemoteExecutorConsoleApp the exit code's meaning it unclear and the actual exception is hidden #21523
    Future
  • Annotate corefx build artifacts with commit hashes #30520
    Future
  • Way to unload a Managed assembly from native library using hostfxr #68949
  • System.Text.Json test failures on Android x86 #49936
    7.0.0
  • Consider removing the System.Memory dependency from TestUtilities on .NETFramework #53422
    Future
  • System.Private.CoreLib.xml is missing from the ref folders #48726
    Future
  • Discussion about how references are defined in libraries #48238
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl project has problems loading in Visual Studio #47809
    7.0.0
  • [Question] Why test libraries that target single TFM use TargetFrameworkS (plural)? #47155
    7.0.0
  • Protect visual studio in CI for libraries #45007
    Future
  • The original target frameworks value must match the aliases while restore #45400
    7.0.0
  • Compose the shared framework without depending on OOB libraries #43118
    7.0.0
  • Make Runtime.json generation better support merging architectures into compatible runtimegroups #66316
  • Unable to build downloaded Release 5.0 runtime preview 5 on Ubuntu 16.04 #37325
    Future
  • CLS-Compliant issue spotted during intellisense for ref in System.DirectoryServices #34953
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies loading failure #68192
  • Fixing build for src/shims/manual to use appropriate configurations #29206
    Future
  • Update license for Microsoft.Bcl.Async nuget #28930
    Future
  • CI Failure: Build Browser wasm Linux Release LibraryTests #68718
  • Remove API Compat baseline validation suppression #68730
    7.0.0
  • Detached ProcessExit() make the main process exit at once with SIGTERM #67294
  • [wasm][aot] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests - Maximum call stack size exceeded #61061
    7.0.0
  • pal::get_own_executable_path() does not work properly with hardlink on FreeBSD #3335
    Future
  • [mono] FullAOT runtime test failures: condition `out_obj' not met #57361
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Eliminate unnecessary load in `TrySetSlot` #69164
    community-contribution
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #69152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a typo #69145
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Re-enable Android OOM test failures #69138
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
  • [GDBJIT] Fix "section extending past end of file" warning #69124
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix linker tests not running and show full path during trimming test execution #69118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error if a reference assembly is platform specific #69116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Support strictly blittable type marshalling #69100
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • avoid allocationg ApplicationProtocol in common case #69098
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Removing comments so won't overwrite doc changes #69089
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

Merged

  • CreateSymbolicLink PInvoke retval must be marshalled as U1 #69150
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update minimum required version of VS to 17.3 #69162
    documentation
  • Fix typo in AssemblyName handling #69157
    area-System.Reflection
  • Tweak Rune.DecodeFromUtf8 #68799
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • skip ignoring Content-Length test on NodeJs #69109
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #69151
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add doc about using local build of apphost #69097
    area-Host
  • Increase helix job timeout for win-arm64 to 300 minutes #69129
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • add option to set TLS cache size #69065
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Perf fix maui dotnet running #69148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop keeping parent stacks for fgWalkTree and friends #69120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid byte[] allocation for IPAddressUtil.IsMulticast #68591
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests` to #69087
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, wasm-aot-test
  • skip unnecessary ALPN processing on Windows #69103
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows
  • Handle case to update loop tables when preheader is removed #68803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Automatically choose correct cross-compile JIT name for SPMI #69091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix heap corruption issue #68443. #69106
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Add the capability to walk up the inheritance chain for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs" #69137
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono] Avoid an assertion when cattrs with array parameters are const… #69077
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update testPackages.proj #69074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update System.Net solution files #69112
    area-System.Net
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Update ApiCompat.proj #69075
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement JsonContext and JsonTypeInfo Overloads for Binary Data #69012
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove Hardlink workaround under FreeBSD #69102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1761806 #69088
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #68921
    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Fix crash in `EvaluateOnCallFrameTests` on CI #69073
    arch-wasm, test-bug, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow some lazy loops to upgrade with auto-atomicity #68989
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove coverlet.collector reference from LibraryImportGenerator tests #69078
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix namespace in error message #69083
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0

    area-Infrastructure-libraries

    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    area-System.Threading
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New NU1701 errors appearing after May 10th release of SDK (6.0.300) #25338
  • Message: Property "MSBildToolsVersion' is not defined #25312

Closed

  • PostBuildEvent skipped when set to Always in .csproj #25316
  • Error on running dotnet app #22848

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25340
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a helper script for identifying the SDK release containing a SHA #25337
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Marcpop msft upgraderuntime605 #25333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #25330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #25329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Servicing F# #25325
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #25328
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #25327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #25332
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #25326
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Aot, Trim and single file analyzers if PublishAot is set #25301
    Area-ILLink
  • Move the publish task tests to helix including netfx run #25306
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the netcoreapp2.1 and netcoreapp2.2 to the current framework #25039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Feature propsoal: Allow use of override keyword on interface method implementations. #3510

Updated

  • FeatureRequest: Support XML Comments on local methods #2110
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: ref readonly method parameters #6010
    Working Set
  • Champion: numeric IntPtr #6065
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Minor corrections to ref fields proposal #6101

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Path parsing differs in handling of `#r` on .NET 6.0 #61233
  • Regex parser produces different messages in .NET 6 #61232
  • Incremental SG - Unit-testing the pipeline / caching-behaviour using GeneratorDriver #61230
  • Sort order different in .NET 6; impacts tests #61229
  • Building skeleton assemblies appears to be much more expensive now that we have generators. #61226
  • Stack frame parser fails to parse line numbers on .NET #61225
  • Completion in doc comments eats the space when typing "code" #61223
  • Existing classification tests need to be updated to run both directly on the roslyn API, or through the LSP wrapper around it. #61219
  • VB.NET .NET 6 Throws "cannot create boxed byref-like values" exception when using AsSpan instead of Substring in an interpolated string #61218
  • Add AnalyzerConfigSet.GetOptionsForDirectory #61217
  • Update Regex subsystem error messages to match changes in .net's error messages #61215
  • Update REgexParser to understand `RegexOption.NonBacktracking` once available in the version of the runtime we reference. #61214
  • Json classification appears to be broken with 'LSP classification' on. #61212
  • Yet Another Formatting Bug - Lambda within Object Initializer #61206
  • Improve NormalizeWhitespace for object initializers #61204
  • Better conversion target rules should be updated for nint/nuint #61199
    17.3

Closed

  • When I copy text which includes a stack trace, the Stack Trace Explorer window appears, covering other content #60382
    17.3
  • Increment operator not recognised as invoking get accessor #43191
    Backlog
  • [Expression Evaluator] C# FunctionResolver resolves async methods to async kickoff method, which does not have debug info. #52313
    Backlog
  • Invalid IL produced for an unused struct load from a `ref` local #60905
    17.3
  • Make local function 'static' removes `unsafe` modifier #61207
  • "Add null check" quickfix should support generating ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull() calls #61181
  • Use explicit type should be updated to replace with non-nullable type if possible #41243
    Backlog
  • Need API for enumerating AnalyzerConfigOptions #41840
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE
  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState" #61216
    Area-IDE
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers
  • feat: Ordering generator by GenerateAfter and GenerateBefore attributes #61210
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add the full VS Mac IVTs to match existing projects #61203
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests for implementing static events in derived interfaces. #61201
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary parameter. #61202
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tests for implementing static properties in derived interfaces. #61200
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE, auto-merge, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add OffsetX and OffsetY for touch events #41619
  • Support indexer use in InputBase #41618
  • "Make method async" refactoring adds "Async" prefix to ASP.NET Controller methods - making the name invalid #41614
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-29145 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #41609
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-29117 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #41608
  • E2E tests ignore javascript errors #41607
    Backlog
  • Can't update to packages to 6.0.5, issues with System.IO.Pipelines supporting >= 6.0.3 #41606
  • Blazor webassembly Hosting Problem #41604
  • Multiple AuthenticationHandlers still not working as expected #41603
  • Kestrel WebSocket AcceptWebSocketAsync NRE #41602
  • Group Lifetime Events in signalr #41601

Closed

  • WebApi: adding ApiVersioning removes numbers from end of controller name #41502
  • SignalR-Response status code does not indicate success: 400 (Request on loopback from external IP) #41559
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24464 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #40598
    Discussions
  • Automatic validation with ApiController does not work as expected #41505
  • Multi-level inheritance with code-behind #35509
    Backlog
  • Rendering Blazor Custom Element from Leaflet #41577
  • Blazor Webassembly SEO - Links are not crawled - Lighthouse #41600
  • Incorrect global:: for value tuples #41598

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating branding & merge internal commits #41617
    2.1.x
  • Count forms with invalid content-disposition in FormFeature #41616
    area-runtime
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41613
    3.1.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41612
    5.0.x
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #41611
    6.0.x
  • Run tests on Windows again #41599
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Update downlevel SiteExtensions versions #41615
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Handle unexpected errors #41597
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Updates selenium dependencies #41605
    7.0-preview5
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Merge HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request cookies on Kestrel #41591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.6
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debugger not debugging some variables correctly #7009
  • Workloads installation broken after attempt to install maui from 'main' branch #7008
  • Maui project pre-compiler errors using partial classes with multi-targetting #7005
  • ActionSheets do not work in MAUI Windows #7004
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #7003
  • Exception being thrown on android physical device with latest version of .NET MAUI #7002
  • Change the control type announced by the VoiceOver screen reader when it encounters a Maui Picker control #7001
  • CarouselView with direct ContentView items in XAML shows error #7000
  • [Windows] Child controls of the grid are automatically resizing, with the size changes of parent Grid #6999
  • Is Maui.Graphics dead? #6998
    .NET 7
  • Modify our templates to include a better version for iOS or build SupportedPlatforms into our targets #6996
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Modal Formsheet on iOS is currently not cancellable on Shell #6995
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Reusing the same page for formsheet Modal causes measuring issues #6994
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android][iOS] OnDestroying method of the Window extended class is not called [Lifecycle] #6993
  • iOS publishing not picking up project runtime identifier #6992
  • (Windows) RC2 - LayoutCycleException when the height or width of a control is less than 0 #6987
  • Issue in Clipping Images in Border #6986

    6.0.300
  • ContentPage.Disappearing event not raised under Windows #6980

Closed

  • - #7006

    6.0.300
  • [Android] Wrong size using a FlexLayout inside a ScrollView #4079
    6.0.300
  • Slider value property is ignored on initialization #6957
    6.0.300
  • Border does not size and display properly #3541
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CollectionView with grids and stacklayouts on itemtemplate #3062
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Replacing CollectionView ItemTemplate Programmatically sets items to zero height, doesn't clear old items. #2525
    6.0.300
  • Exception if swipe to dismiss modal page on iOS (Simulator, real device not tested yet) #6666
    6.0.300
  • [Bug][Template] Move splash screen to Resources\Images folder of the template #2208
    6.0.300
  • Remove WebView2 Requirement, or Remove WebView2 data gathering #6723
  • Switches are unreliable inside a CollectionView #6346
    6.0.300
  • Unable to install latest workloads in Azure Pipelines #6983
  • Voiceover is not announcing the current count when we double tap on "click me" button. #6216
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Voiceover is not reading the Role of "click me" button. #6215
    6.0.300-servicing
  • macOS: Environment.GetFolderPath APIs return null #6984
  • [Android] AutomationId no longer works #4714
    6.0.300-servicing
  • On Windows you still cannot execute an application without running it from Visual Studio #6934
    6.0.300-servicing
  • The Shell FlyoutItems didn't appear when the app is in dark theme #6519
    6.0.300
  • Maui Picker with a Title property has no accessible name for screen readers using the UI Automation API #6928
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] update AOT profile #7007

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using EXECUTE AS USER puts session in kill state #27999
  • Any way to set default `JsonSerializerOptions`? #27991
  • SQLite InMemory EnsureCreated() throws SqliteException (table already exists) #27990
    7.0.0
  • Caching query result for the lifetime of DbContext #27989

Closed

  • Unclear docs on test from cmd line #27923
    7.0.0
  • GetColumnName() in EF Core 6 returns property name not mapped column name #27968
  • How to specify which SQL Server DbContext constructor to use in ASP.NET Core dependency injection? #27982
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold -d flag does not work but the full name flag --data-annotations does work #27981
  • Initial migration creating shadow properties following documentation to add navigation properties to Identity. #27992
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 6.0.4 #27855
  • EF Core is closing the connection in async flow #27882
  • Query: Consider having predicate on SqlEnumerableExpression so providers can integrate it accordingly #27935
    7.0.0
  • Investigation into aggregates, supported operators and multiple enumerable parameters #27948
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27998
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27997
  • Query: Configure and use TypeMapping on DbFunction #27995
  • Bump .NET SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4 #27994
  • Query: TPC prune unused concrete tables and columns #27993
  • Throw if an entity type in table-sharing uses TPC #27988

Merged

  • Update test instructions and remove 2.2 #27938
    community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #27996
  • Query: Introduce EnumerableExpression which is not SQL token #27969

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Remove Convert node when up-casting to an interface #27964
    waiting-for-response
